name: CUBE-A-THON: Renamed and Remade WebGL Edition
name_original: CUBE-A-THON: Renamed and Remade WebGL Edition
description:
WELCOME TO CUBE-A-THON: Renamed and Remade's Overview and Download page!

Please note that this is the WebGL Version of the game.

Dodge obstacles as you play through this very fun 3D Racer!

the game updates regularly so be sure to come back every 2 weeks on Tuesday 3:45P.M. EST for the latest news! 

You will have to go to full screen to see most of the game, when you're done with the game, simply X-out of the browser (I can't find a way to un-full screen it)

Good Luck and Have Fun!
